an6.116:4.3: Restlessness, lack of restraint, and negligence.
an6.116:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.116:4.7: You should develop serenity to give up restlessness, restraint to give up lack of restraint, and diligence to give up negligence.
an6.116:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
